1.title: Do You LIke Broccoli Ice Cream?

episode of.title: Do You Like Broccoli Ice Cream? & More Kids Songs: Super Simple Songs (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: "Do You Like Broccoli Ice Cream?" is an original (and very silly) food song and episode from Super Simple Learning created for teaching how to express food likes and dislikes, and asking and answering "Do you like _______?" questions.

2.title: The Itsy Bitsy Spider

episode of.title: Do You Like Broccoli Ice Cream? & More Kids Songs: Super Simple Songs (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: The Itsy Bitsy Spider went up the water spout.

3.title: Hello Hello!

episode of.title: Do You Like Broccoli Ice Cream? & More Kids Songs: Super Simple Songs (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Hello hello. Can you clap your hands?

4.title: Walking In The Jungle

episode of.title: Do You Like Broccoli Ice Cream? & More Kids Songs: Super Simple Songs (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Are you ready for a little adventure? Let's see what animals we can find on a walk in the jungle.

5.title: Who Took The Cookie?

episode of.title: Do You Like Broccoli Ice Cream? & More Kids Songs: Super Simple Songs (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: It's the classic 'who-dun-it?' rhyme. Find out who took the cookie from the cookie jar?

6.title: Do You Like Spaghetti Yogurt?

episode of.title: Do You Like Broccoli Ice Cream? & More Kids Songs: Super Simple Songs (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: If you like the Broccoli Ice Cream song, try out the new "Do You Like Spaghetti Yogurt?" version. Sing along with the sequel to this fun and silly food song.

7.title: Rock Scissors Paper #1

episode of.title: Do You Like Broccoli Ice Cream? & More Kids Songs: Super Simple Songs (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: Rock Scissors Paper, Rock Scissors Paper, 1,2,3...play with me. Put your hands together for a fun and creative fingerplay song for kids. What is it?

8.title: The Shape Song #1

episode of.title: Do You Like Broccoli Ice Cream? & More Kids Songs: Super Simple Songs (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Get out your crayons, we're making pictures using shapes. Can you find a circle, a diamond, a square, and a heart? Try it with The Shape Song #1.

9.title: I Have A Pet

episode of.title: Do You Like Broccoli Ice Cream? & More Kids Songs: Super Simple Songs (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: I have a pet. He is a dog. And he says woof woof woof woof woof.

10.title: Head Shoulders Knees & Toes (Speeding Up)

episode of.title: Do You Like Broccoli Ice Cream? & More Kids Songs: Super Simple Songs (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: Head Shoulders Knees and Toes (Speeding Up) from Super Simple Songs is a great exercise song. Get up and move with the kids' song classic as our elephant instructor leads you through a super fun aerobics routine.

11.title: Let's Go To The Zoo

episode of.title: Do You Like Broccoli Ice Cream? & More Kids Songs: Super Simple Songs (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: Dance like the animals do with this active kids song "Let's Go To The Zoo". Stomp like elephants, jump like kangaroos, swing like monkeys, waddle like penguins, slither like snakes, and swim like polar bears.

12.title: Hide And Seek

episode of.title: Do You Like Broccoli Ice Cream? & More Kids Songs: Super Simple Songs (TV Series 2017– )

12.plot: Hide and seek. Hide and seek. Let's play hide and seek.

13.title: The Shape Song #2

episode of.title: Do You Like Broccoli Ice Cream? & More Kids Songs: Super Simple Songs (TV Series 2017– )

13.plot: We're drawing and finding shapes. Can you spot the triangle, rectangle, oval, and star? Try it with The Shape Song #2.

14.title: Wag Your Tail

episode of.title: Do You Like Broccoli Ice Cream? & More Kids Songs: Super Simple Songs (TV Series 2017– )

14.plot: "Wag Your Tail" is a fun music-and-movement song that teaches the characteristics of some of kids' favorite animals.

15.title: We All Fall Down

episode of.title: Do You Like Broccoli Ice Cream? & More Kids Songs: Super Simple Songs (TV Series 2017– )

15.plot: Using the melody of the classic nursery rhyme "Ring Around The Rosie", "We All Fall Down" introduces simple and fun action verbs and is great for getting the wiggles out.

16.title: 10 Little Airplanes

episode of.title: Do You Like Broccoli Ice Cream? & More Kids Songs: Super Simple Songs (TV Series 2017– )

16.plot: One little, two little, three little airplanes. Four little, five little, six little airplanes. Seven little, eight little, nine little airplanes. 10 little airplanes. - whooosh.

17.title: Rock Scissors Paper #2

episode of.title: Do You Like Broccoli Ice Cream? & More Kids Songs: Super Simple Songs (TV Series 2017– )

17.plot: Ice Cream? Helicopter? What is it? Get your hands and fingers ready for this Super Simple Song for kids.

18.title: How's The Weather?

episode of.title: Do You Like Broccoli Ice Cream? & More Kids Songs: Super Simple Songs (TV Series 2017– )

18.plot: It's a Super Simple weather song. How's the weather where you are? Sunny? Rainy? Cloudy? Snowy?

19.title: Un-huh!

episode of.title: Do You Like Broccoli Ice Cream? & More Kids Songs: Super Simple Songs (TV Series 2017– )

19.plot: A fun way to sing this song with children if to give everyone hand puppets and have them nod their heads "yes" and shake their heads "no" as they sing along.

20.title: Bye Bye Goodbye

episode of.title: Do You Like Broccoli Ice Cream? & More Kids Songs: Super Simple Songs (TV Series 2017– )

20.plot: This super simple goodbye song is great for ending nursery school, and preschool classes. It's very easy to sing along with and learn through gestures, and ends with instrumental music to play as children leave the classroom.

imdb.title: Do You Like Broccoli Ice Cream? & More Kids Songs: Super Simple Songs
akas: Do You Like Broccoli Ice Cream? & More Kids Songs: Super Simple Songs (Canada)
plot: Do You Like Broccoli Ice Cream? and More Kids Songs includes a collection of children's songs and nursery rhymes like The Itsy Bitsy Spider, Walking In The Jungle, Who Took The Cookie?, and more. Super fun, super silly, and super simple.::Skyship Entertainment Company
